typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		A1 as short,
		A2 as string,
		A3 as string,
		A4 as integer,
		A5 as short,
		A6 as short,
		A7 as short,
		A8 as short,
		A9 as short,
		A10 as double,
		A11 as short,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as double,
		A14 as short,
		A15 as string,
		A16 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dbo.district.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DistrictData
DistrictData derive(insert_date = currentTimestamp(),
		modified_date = currentTimestamp(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		district_sk as integer,
		alternate_district_id as integer,
		A2 as string,
		A3 as string,
		A4 as integer,
		A5 as integer,
		A6 as integer,
		A7 as integer,
		A8 as integer,
		A9 as integer,
		A10 as decimal(5,1),
		A11 as integer,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as decimal(4,2),
		A14 as integer,
		A15 as string,
		A16 as integer,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DW
